forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow overnight. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Snow will be heavy at times especially in the evening. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 30cm or more of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Snow will be heavy at times especially in the evening. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. A foot or more of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low -4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy early. Then a mix of wintry precipitation expected late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
